mapper.insert: insert into t_Qc_Intelligent_Asr (PID, LOG_ID, LEAV_WORD_TIME, ANI, LEAVEWORD_PATH, VOICE_FILE_NAME, CALLID, FULL_PATH) select sys_guid(), LOG_ID, LEAV_WORD_TIME, ANI, LEAVEWORD_PATH, VOICE_FILE_NAME, CALLID, FULL_PATH from IVR_JT_LEAVWORD@HUAWEI_ICD_DB_LINK ivr where not exists (select callid from t_Qc_Intelligent_Asr asr where ivr.CALLID = asr.callid)
mapper.select: select VOICE_FILE_NAME as voice_filename,FULL_PATH from T_QC_INTELLIGENT_ASR t where t.output_filepath is null and t.output_filename is null and t.asr_status = 0 and t.asr_timestamp is null and t.asr_failtimes < 4 and ROWNUM < 25
mapper.update: update T_QC_INTELLIGENT_ASR set output_filepath = #{param.filePath}, output_filename = FULL_PATH || #{param.task_no} || '/', asr_status = 1, asr_timestamp = sysdate where voice_file_name = #{param.recordName}
